effect.en: Your opponent's Benched Pokémon can't be healed.
effect.fr: Les Pokémon de Banc de votre adversaire ne peuvent pas être soignés.
effect.es: Los Pokémon en Banca de tu rival no pueden ser curados.
effect.it: I Pokémon nella panchina del tuo avversario non possono essere curati.
effect.pt: Os Pokémon no Banco do seu oponente não podem ser curados.
effect.de: Die Pokémon auf der Bank deines Gegners können nicht geheilt werden.

description.en: It wears a rag fashioned into a Pikachu costume in an effort to look less scary. Unfortunately, the costume only makes it creepier.
